messages.title: Working together for Local People
messages.content: John McNally already works closely with the popular and energetic SNP MSP for Falkirk West, Michael Matheson in the Denny Ward..

messages.title: Fed up being taken for granted? Looking for change?
messages.content: Fed up with your MP featuring in the MPâ€™s expenses scandal? Does this lead to the burning sense of anger at him for leaving you to pick up his tailcoats, but not sure who assists the incumbent...

mentions.tacticalSituation: the most local people calculating actual votes can bring about the change most local people want to see.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet shows the 2007 Scottish Parliamentary Result for The Falkirk West Constituency.
